title: Computer Crashes after Champion Loading Screen
body: I've been playing this game on my laptop for a couple years now and all of a sudden everytime I get in a game my entire laptop just freezes. The picture the spawn pool loads with all the champions then about 3 seconds later the image just freezes and I have to hard reset my computer..... If anyone knows why this might be please let me know

replies.body:
Hmmm.. If you're running Windows 10, this may be caused by the Xbox Game DVR feature that was enabled as a result of the anniversary updates. I recommend you [disable this feature](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to see if it causes any change.

Let me know if this helped. :)
